articles.title: This is what determines the price of gas - CNN Video
articles.description: Gas prices rise and fall but where is your money actually going? CNN's Jon Sarlin breaks down what goes in every cent at the pump.

articles.author: Allison Morrow, CNN Business
articles.title: Well, drivers, we've got good news and bad news about gas prices
articles.description: There's good news and bad news on the gas prices front. Good news: Some price relief could be on the way. The bad news: It's because traders are betting on a recession.

articles.author: Daniella Diaz, CNN
articles.title: Gas tax holiday likely to land on empty amid hurdles in Congress
articles.description: President Joe Biden's call for Congress to suspend federal gasoline and diesel taxes will likely land on empty in the Senate.

articles.author: Paul R. La Monica, CNN Business
articles.title: Could a housing slump threaten the stock market and the entire economy?
articles.description: The red-hot housing market is starting to show signs of cooling off. Prices have spiked to levels unaffordable for many prospective buyers, and mortgage rates have jumped following the Federal Reserve's rate hikes and a surge in bond yields.

articles.author: Analysis by Matt Egan, CNN Business
articles.title: Analysis: A gas tax holiday sounds fantastic. But there's a reason Obama bashed it as a 'gimmick'
articles.description: In the spring of 2008, as gas prices were barreling towards record highs, presidential candidates John McCain and Hillary Clinton threw their weight behind a gas tax holiday.
